Assist technology partners with the development of remediation plans to mitigate weaknesses, providing thought leadership on the appropriateness of the plan ', 'Bachelor’s Degree, ideally in a technology-related field, or equivalent work experience ', 'Ability to “manage-up”, often working closely with the executive team to complete projects and/or host customers ', 'Demonstrable knowledge of information security best practices ', 'Demonstrable knowledge of information security control frameworks, i.e. National Institute of Standards and Technology (NIST) Risk Management Framework (RMF), International Organization of Standardization (ISO)/International Electrotechnical Commission (IEC) 27001 Information Security Management ', 'Bachelor’s Degree, ideally in a technology-related field, or equivalent work experience Deep experience in one of the following security focus areas: web application security, system security hardening, AWS Cloud Security and compliance as code, offensive security, defensive security Certified Information Security Systems Professional (CISSP), Global Information Assurance Certification (GIAC) Security Essentials (GSEC), Offensive Security Certified Professional (OSCP), or equivalent information security certification Experience in performing vulnerability assessments using a variety of tools and techniques and prioritizing remediation efforts based on risk and availability of resources Demonstrable knowledge of information security control frameworks, i.e. National Institute of Standards and Technology (NIST) Risk Management Framework (RMF), International Organization of Standardization (ISO)/International Electrotechnical Commission (IEC) 27001 Information Security Management Demonstrable knowledge of information security best practices High attention to detail and excellent analytical skills Excellent oral and written communication skills; ability to interact with internal and external stakeholders at all levels of the organization Customer centric (internal and external), motivated, focused personality Self Accountable and self motivated Sound independent judgement Ability to set priorities and adapt to changes in a quick, professional manner Ability to use discretion when handling confidential information Ability to “manage-up”, often working closely with the executive team to complete projects and/or host customers ', 'You will be the leader of an information security specialty area for your peers (Cloud, Web Application, Offensive, Defensive, etc), and provide mentoring and oversight in your area of concentration as necessary. You will be responsible for mentoring junior members of the team and other members of the Tech organization without a security background. You will make recommendations on technical solutions and the adoption of tools/systems that will increase the security posture of your area of concentration in relation to the risk exposure level.\xa0', 'Customer centric (internal and external), motivated, focused personality ', 'Analyzes and recommends security controls and procedures in business processes related to use of information systems and assets, and monitors for effectiveness ', 'Ability to use discretion when handling confidential information ', 'Integrate security into the software development lifecycle, to include architecture security assessments, system security documentation, vulnerability assessments, and recommendations for improvements in security posture\xa0 ', 'Excellent oral and written communication skills; ability to interact with internal and external stakeholders at all levels of the organization ', 'Architect, design, and monitor information system security controls and countermeasures relevant to the risks associated with the application of technology in support of our customers and information infrastructure Analyzes and recommends security controls for the entire lifecycle of information systems, and assess controls for effectiveness Analyzes and recommends security controls and procedures in business processes related to use of information systems and assets, and monitors for effectiveness Monitors information systems for security incidents and vulnerabilities; develops monitoring and visibility capabilities; reports on incidents, vulnerabilities, and trends Responds to information system security incidents, including investigation of, countermeasures to, and recovery from computer-based attacks, unauthorized access, and policy breaches; interacts and coordinates with third-party incident responders, including law enforcement Assess authentication and access controls of user and system accounts, security/access roles, and access permissions to information assets Analyzes trends and changes in threat and compliance environment with respect to organizational risk; advises organization management and develops and executes plans for compliance and mitigation of risk; performs risk and compliance self-assessments, and engages and coordinates third-party risk and compliance assessments Analyzes and develops information security governance, including organizational policies, procedures, standards, baselines and guidelines with respect to information security and use and operation of information systems Develops and administers, or provides advice, evaluation, and oversight for, information security training and awareness programs Integrate security into the software development lifecycle, to include architecture security assessments, system security documentation, vulnerability assessments, and recommendations for improvements in security posture\xa0 Play an active role in the design and execution of infrastructure initiatives to ensure an evolving adherence to industry best practices for information security\xa0\xa0 Lead the execution of the security assessment of specific technical areas of a project, supervising other team members, and coaching/teaching/mentoring where necessary Assess audit findings/gaps including control weaknesses with an appropriate degree of professional skepticism, seeking to fully understand risks to Clear Capital. Assist technology partners with the development of remediation plans to mitigate weaknesses, providing thought leadership on the appropriateness of the plan Demonstrate commitment to client’s and the CTO’s strategic vision, be a self-starter, and promote project ownership and responsibility for actions ', 'Salary commensurate with experience', 'Demonstrate commitment to client’s and the CTO’s strategic vision, be a self-starter, and promote project ownership and responsibility for actions ', 'Experience in performing vulnerability assessments using a variety of tools and techniques and prioritizing remediation efforts based on risk and availability of resources ', 'Ability to set priorities and adapt to changes in a quick, professional manner ', 'Analyzes and recommends security controls for the entire lifecycle of information systems, and assess controls for effectiveness ', 'Deep experience in one of the following security focus areas: web application security, system security hardening, AWS Cloud Security and compliance as code, offensive security, defensive security ', 'Sound independent judgement ', 'This key position will play a critical role in safeguarding our organization’s technology infrastructure. You will be responsible for assessing risk and recommending appropriate security measures and evaluating the effectiveness of their implementation in protecting the confidentiality, integrity, and availability of the information systems and the data entrusted to our safekeeping. You will stay abreast of company business strategies, information technology advances in the industry, and the risk profile of assigned product areas to ensure relevancy of all countermeasure approaches.\xa0', 'Primary Duties and Responsibilities', 'As a product security engineer, you will review new and existing applications for vulnerabilities and opportunities for enhancements in their security posture. Interact with application owners to increase security awareness and the potential risks presented by application vulnerabilities, and establish the appropriate mitigating actions to manage risk to an acceptable level. Review infrastructure components, their configurations and technical controls, working with system owners to identify security gaps, establishing the appropriate mitigation steps as necessary with timelines for remediation. Maintain a complete understanding of the implementation of security controls, the security architecture, and resulting security posture of assigned product lines, and support the product owner as the product security expert during customer engagements and interactions.', 'Play an active role in the design and execution of infrastructure initiatives to ensure an evolving adherence to industry best practices for information security\xa0\xa0 ', 'To all recruitment agencies: Clear Capital does not accept agency resumes. Please do not forward resumes to our jobs alias, Clear Capital employees, or any other company location. Clear Capital is not responsible for any fees related to unsolicited resumes.', 'Required Job Related Skills and Experience', 'Develops and administers, or provides advice, evaluation, and oversight for, information security training and awareness programs ', 'Certified Information Security Systems Professional (CISSP), Global Information Assurance Certification (GIAC) Security Essentials (GSEC), Offensive Security Certified Professional (OSCP), or equivalent information security certification ', 'Lead the execution of the security assessment of specific technical areas of a project, supervising other team members, and coaching/teaching/mentoring where necessary ', 'Self Accountable and self motivated ', 'Assess authentication and access controls of user and system accounts, security/access roles, and access permissions to information assets ', 'Monitors information systems for security incidents and vulnerabilities; develops monitoring and visibility capabilities; reports on incidents, vulnerabilities, and trends ', 'Compensation', 'Responds to information system security incidents, including investigation of, countermeasures to, and recovery from computer-based attacks, unauthorized access, and policy breaches; interacts and coordinates with third-party incident responders, including law enforcement ', 'High attention to detail and excellent analytical skills ', 'About Us', 'Clear Capital is an equal opportunity employer', 'Architect, design, and monitor information system security controls and countermeasures relevant to the risks associated with the application of technology in support of our customers and information infrastructure ', 'Analyzes and develops information security governance, including organizational policies, procedures, standards, baselines and guidelines with respect to information security and use and operation of information systems ', 'Clear Capital is the premier provider of real estate valuation, analytics, and technology solutions. Powered by its more than 45 years worth of information on nearly every U.S. metro, neighborhood, and property, Clear Capital’s solutions are trusted by community credit unions and billion-dollar financial institutions alike. Clear Capital is headquartered in Reno-Tahoe with a team of more than 500 nationwide, dedicated to going wherever it leads, and doing whatever it takes.', 'Analyzes trends and changes in threat and compliance environment with respect to organizational risk; advises organization management and develops and executes plans for compliance and mitigation of risk; performs risk and compliance self-assessments, and engages and coordinates third-party risk and compliance assessments ']

job_title: Data Reporting Developer IV (Tableau - Contract to Hire)
job_text: ['', ' Develop dashboards and operational reports using Tableau, Power BI and SSRS. ', ' Communicate to CO-OP senior level executives and clients CO-OPs reporting strategy, solutions and roadmap. ', ' Conduct reviews of peer data and reporting development to ensure solutions meet PCI and other regulation standards, are built for performance and meet development best practices. ', ' Excellent communication skills and ability to translate the complex to simple and easier terms for business leaders and users of data. ', ' Ability to troubleshoot more complex data integrity issues involving multiple data sources including 3rd party data, and further analyze data for validity and completeness then document findings with recommendations. ', ' BS in CIS, Data Management, Data Analytics, or similar, or equivalent job experience. ', ' Collaborate within the direct team in accordance with Team Agreement, Definition of Ready, and Definition of Done. ', ' Adhere to Agile principles and philosophies (Scrum or Kanban, as applicable) in fulfillment of the role. ', ' Tuition reimbursement. ', ' Follow industry standards and advances on data driven technologies and tools and further recommend those that will help further advance CO-OPs data and reporting roadmap. ', ' Document development efforts as required by CO-OP change management practices. ', ' Actively supports our CO-OP culture and embraces our core values of Work as Partners, Communicate Openly and Honestly, Demonstrate Excellence and Champion Change in all interactions. ', ' Ability to lead and consult others including both technical resources and business partners. ', 'What You’ll Need To Succeed', ' Ability to design reporting with performance at the forefront by recommending database indexing solutions. ', ' Expert knowledge of SSRS , Power BI ,Tableau Desktop Pro (version 2018+). ', ' Ability to utilize ODBC connection tools within tools such as SSRS and Tableau to connect to a variety of data sources including SQL database tables, Excel files, Oracle, MS Access databases. ', ' Fulfill the role in the spirit of the Agile Manifesto, with emphasis on delivery of incremental value with frequent iterations and feedback loops. ', ' Fun, challenging and, collaborative work environment with passionate colleagues that care deeply about the intersection of technology and human-centered financial services. ', ' Need help finding the right job? ', ' Why Join CO-OP? ', ' Ability to configure report delivery solutions in both SSRS Report Server and Tableau Server, including user administration where platform is exposed externally to network. ', ' Develop enterprise and client level reporting solutions in SSRS, Tableau Desktop Pro and Tableau Server, serving the needs from operational to executive reporting. ', ' Ability within SSRS to build advanced reports utilizing a data set consisting of multiple data sources, data sets using joins, recursive queries, report matrices, advanced parameters, textual hierarchal reports and graphical and mapping reports. ', 'Data Reporting Developer IV ', ' Design and create enterprise level report delivery solutions within SSRS Report Server and Tableau Server that support both CO-OPs internal needs as well as client needs. ', '  Actively supports our CO-OP culture and embraces our core values of Work as Partners, Communicate Openly and Honestly, Demonstrate Excellence and Champion Change in all interactions.  ', ' Regular and reliable attendance. ', ' Data development within a PCI environment. ', ' Ability to connect and join different data sources for the purpose of creating impactful reporting in SSRS, Tableau and SQL data extracts. ', ' Fun, challenging and, collaborative work environment with passionate colleagues that care deeply about the intersection of technology and human-centered financial services.  Great Work/Life Benefits – Paid Time Off (PTO), Maternity, Parental, Family Care, Adoption Leave Programs, Community Volunteer Time Off, and 10 Paid Holidays.  Health benefits – medical, dental, & vision plus wellness programs and gym reimbursements.  401K with generous company match.  Tuition reimbursement. ', ' 10+ years’ experience where primary responsibility involves advanced enterprise and client facing report design and advanced development in SSRS and Tableau. ', 'The Opportunity ', 'What You Can Look Forward To', ' BS in CIS, Data Management, Data Analytics, or similar, or equivalent job experience.  10+ years’ experience where primary responsibility involves advanced enterprise and client facing report design and advanced development in SSRS and Tableau. Expert knowledge of SQL.  Ability to utilize ODBC connection tools within tools such as SSRS and Tableau to connect to a variety of data sources including SQL database tables, Excel files, Oracle, MS Access databases. ', ' Collaborate with operations and business units to gain an understanding of data needs and further translate those needs to data and reporting requirements. ', ' Expert knowledge of SQL. ', ' Expert knowledge of Tableau dashboard development. ', ' Transform business and client data requirements into meaningful data extracts, reports and data visualizations while meeting CO-OP marketing and client user experience standards. ', ' Health benefits – medical, dental, & vision plus wellness programs and gym reimbursements. ', ' Knowledge of Agile methodologies and Jira. ', ' Expert Knowledge of SSRS Report Server platform (version 2016). ', ' Provide oversight and guidance when required for less senior data and report development staff members. ', ' Collaborate across teams and across business areas in the spirit of an Agile mindset. ', ' Ability to analyze enterprise level data sources and determine relationships between those sources. ', ' Work as a cross-functional team member in an Agile setting to help complete and deliver the team commitments. ', ' Collaborate with operations and business units to gain an understanding of data needs and further translate those needs to data and reporting requirements. Collaborate within the direct team in accordance with Team Agreement, Definition of Ready, and Definition of Done. Responsible for reporting risks that are identified to the appropriate team and/or management. ['', '• Coordinate the deployment of new hardware assets to replace aging equipment', 'Hitachi Vantara is seeking an experienced Linux and Data Center Engineer to join their Systems Administration team in an exciting and high-visibility environment. This position is full-time and will be based in our Englewood, CO office, working in facilities in the local South DTC area. Working in a global operations team environment, the Linux Systems Administrator will require extensive Infrastructure experience with deep technical expertise in Linux (RHEL,CentOS), working experience on fundamental AWS services such as EC2, S3, ECS, VPC, ELB, CloudWatch, Route 53, EBS, Cloud Front Etc., and physical datacenter working experience including power types, racking & stacking, e-waste disposal, physical security controls, etc.', 'o Ansible, Puppet, Chef, or other configuration management tools ', 'o Virtualized infrastructure (VMware) ', '• Manage security access lists and audit reviews of the data center', '• Perform troubleshooting for hardware and environmental issues', '\xa0', '• Provision, upgrade, configure, troubleshoot, administer, implement, and support the software applications, tools & services that support our business processes, while ensuring proper integration is in place. Supported deployments include server, cloud (AWS), Software as a Service (SaaS), and Platform as a Service (PaaS) ', '• Identify opportunities to automate redundant operational tasks and improve the infrastructure support efficiencies through data analysis ', 'Hitachi Vantara, a wholly-owned subsidiary of Hitachi, Ltd., guides our customers from what’s now to what’s next by solving their digital challenges. Working alongside each customer, we apply our unmatched industrial and digital capabilities to their data and applications to benefit both business and society. More than 80% of the Fortune 100 trust Hitachi Vantara to help them develop new revenue streams, unlock competitive advantages, lower costs, enhance customer experiences, and deliver social and environmental value.', 'Qualifications', 'Minimum of a B.S. in Computer Science, MIS or related degree and five (5) years of relevant experience or combination of education, experience, and trainingExcellent problem-solving skills required6+ years on managing and maintaining Enterprise Linux environmentsAdvanced knowledge in the following technology areas o Linux systems, network security principles, and general systems administration best practices & support. o Ansible, Puppet, Chef, or other configuration management tools o Configure Security Groups, Roles, IAM Policy, VPC peering, auto-scaling resources in AWS o Scripting - two or more of: Python, PowerCLI, PowerShell, Ruby, Linux Shell Scripting, or comparable scripting languageWorking knowledge of and experience with Agile and ITILAbility to work independently and within a global teamExcellent communication and verbal skills as well as business acumenDatacenter and hardware experienceo Ability to work with vendors and support contacts to resolve hardware failureso Able to lift 50 poundso Working knowledge of creating and updating rack elevation and cable maps', 'o Scripting - two or more of: Python, PowerCLI, PowerShell, Ruby, Linux Shell Scripting, or comparable scripting language', 'o Windows Server 2012/2016, DNS, Active Directory and Group Policy o Virtualized infrastructure (VMware) o F5 global and local traffic management (e.g. F5’s GTM and LTM modules) o Web stack Infrastructure to include networking, security, firewalls, load balancers, Apache, Tomcat / JBoss', '6+ years on managing and maintaining Enterprise Linux environments', 'We are an equal opportunity employer. ', 'o Working knowledge of creating and updating rack elevation and cable maps', 'Advanced knowledge in the following technology areas ', '• Design, implement, secure and maintain systems in test, development, and production environments', 'Datacenter and hardware experience', '\xa0Responsibilities', 'Minimum of a B.S. in Computer Science, MIS or related degree and five (5) years of relevant experience or combination of education, experience, and training', '• Identify and analyze the issues that hamper system performance, and work in close coordination with development teams to recommend solutions for resolution ', 'The Company\xa0', 'o Web stack Infrastructure to include networking, security, firewalls, load balancers, Apache, Tomcat / JBoss', 'Excellent communication and verbal skills as well as business acumen', 'Ability to work independently and within a global team', 'The Role', '• Develop, maintain, and communicate diagrams, system configurations and technical documentation', '• Enhance patch management processes across entire stack and perform vulnerability remediation', 'o F5 global and local traffic management (e.g. F5’s GTM and LTM modules) ']

job_title: Customer Facing Data Scientist - New England
job_text: ['', 'Strong customer interaction experience', 'Excellent organizational, communication, writing and interpersonal skills', 'Familiarity with data platform technology integrations', 'Requirements', 'Desired', ' Advanced degree Familiarity with consultative sales process in the analytics marketplace Familiarity with data platform technology integrations Experience dealing with complex customer organizations', 'Work side-by-side with the Sales, Account Management, and Field Engineering teams to help our customers achieve their goals with DataRobot. ', 'Act internally as the voice of the customer to the Product, Engineering, and Marketing teams', 'Bachelor’s degree, preferably in a quantitative subject', 'In the pre-sales process, represent the DataRobot product to customer executives – lead demonstrations, advise on and evaluate the viability of customer use cases, help develop success criteria, support Proof of Value trials, and quantify the business impact of automation-first data science solutions', 'Advanced degree', 'Act as a trusted advisor on AI; enable customers to solve complex data science problems using DataRobot – including problem framing, data preparation, scripting, model building, model deployment, model management, and output consumption', 'Strong project management skills', ' Support customers through the entire customer lifecycle beginning with pre-sales and as an ongoing client of DataRobot Act as a trusted advisor on AI; enable customers to solve complex data science problems using DataRobot – including problem framing, data preparation, scripting, model building, model deployment, model management, and output consumption In the pre-sales process, represent the DataRobot product to customer executives – lead demonstrations, advise on and evaluate the viability of customer use cases, help develop success criteria, support Proof of Value trials, and quantify the business impact of automation-first data science solutions Work side-by-side with the Sales, Account Management, and Field Engineering teams to help our customers achieve their goals with DataRobot.  Act internally as the voice of the customer to the Product, Engineering, and Marketing teams Present at conferences and/or help create other marketing content ', 'Familiarity with consultative sales process in the analytics marketplace', 'Support customers through the entire customer lifecycle beginning with pre-sales and as an ongoing client of DataRobot', 'Fluency with scripting in Python or R (preferably both)', 'Up to 40% travel', 'Responsibilities', 'Present at conferences and/or help create other marketing content', 'Experience collaborating with business stakeholders to ensure that machine learning solutions deliver successfully on business outcomes', ' 4-5+ years of real-world business experience in a data science role Bachelor’s degree, preferably in a quantitative subject Hands-on experience building and implementing machine learning or AI models Experience collaborating with business stakeholders to ensure that machine learning solutions deliver successfully on business outcomes Strong customer interaction experience Strong project management skills Excellent organizational, communication, writing and interpersonal skills Familiarity with a variety of technical tools for the manipulation of data Fluency with scripting in Python or R (preferably both) Up to 40% travel ', 'Experience dealing with complex customer organizations', '4-5+ years of real-world business experience in a data science role', 'Hands-on experience building and implementing machine learning or AI models', 'Familiarity with a variety of technical tools for the manipulation of data']

job_text: ["Job Title: Senior Software EngineerLocation: Beaverton, ORDuration: 6 Months contractDescriptionAs a Senior Software Engineer, you will join a team of engineers, scrum masters, and product owners to develop and grow systems that reach millions of consumers through the our client brand.As part of this team, you will be involved in designing and building services in a continuous delivery model on the our client cloud platform. create, store, exchange, and use all forms of information. Manages employees, sets goals, coach's staff, supports development, collaborates on hiring decisions, disciplinary actions, performance management, and recognition, and rewards. Develops action plans and processes, in coordination with management team, for integrating activities and optimizing department resources to meet major goals and objectives. Facilitates or performs application support, problem solving, and issue resolution with internal and external resources. Contributes and reviews recommendations for technical solutions. Resolves issues and determines options for issue resolution Manages and/or contributes to the technical components of the RFP process. Leads and owns engagements with software vendors to ensure that code and configuration requirements and deliverables are met. Enforces architecture, governance, security, and global process standards to system changes and deployments. Coordinates compliance issue identification and remediation. ['', 'Senior Software Engineer - Trading Systems Characteristics:', " You have a Bachelor's or advanced degree in Computer Science and deep foundational knowledge in low level computing. You have 5+ years of experience designing and implementing low latency trading systems where you have contributed highly optimized C++ and Python code to projects. You have the battle scars of an engineer that has designed and delivered super fast trading systems that connect to global markets. You fought to balance robustness, scalability, data throughput, and latency concerns and won. You are passionate about exploring new technologies and have demonstrated your ability to incorporate these finds into existing stacks. You live to move fast and release; developing with pace and velocity. You communicate technical ideas with ease and always look to collaborate to deliver high quality products. Your experience will help you mentor team members, define our engineering standards, and drive a system design approach to building new services. ['', 'Bachelor degree in Computer Science or a related field; or related work experience5 or more years previous experience in software development, computer engineering, or other related fields', 'Competitive salary and full benefit packages including PTO, medical, dental, vision, FSA, and 401K', 'Collaborate with other developers to design, develop, test, deploy, and monitor services. You own your work end-to-end.', 'Technology:\xa0We work primarily in Java, Groovy, Mule running in Google Cloud. We leverage modern tools like Loggly, New Relic, Gitlab, Google BigQuery, Google Cloud Dataflow, and more.', 'We are an equal opportunity employer and value diversity at our company. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status.', 'You are someone who cares deeply about pets and ensuring they are healthy and happy. At Vetsource, we create a great relationship between veterinarians and their clients by enabling pet parents to get important medications and foods delivered directly to their homes.', 'ORGANIZATIONAL RESPONSIBILITY STATEMENT', 'In addition to the job-specific responsibilities listed above, all employees are expected to support and model Vetsource’s Core Value Principles: Do the right thing every time; Treat others the way they want to be treated; Embrace Change; Be innovative; Get it done; Work hard, have fun! Employees will be held accountable for knowledge and effective application of these principles.', 'Bachelor degree in Computer Science or a related field; or related work experience', 'Get stuff done. You care about delivering value every single day.', 'What We Offer:', 'Deliver awesome code. You care about clean code, quality, reliability, and performance.\xa0\xa0', 'We are looking for an experienced Engineer who knows how to design and deliver awesome software. You will be a key player in a highly engaged team in a supportive environment helping other engineers do their best work.', 'Other duties/tasks as assigned. You’re flexible and embrace change.', '5 or more years previous experience in software development, computer engineering, or other related fields', 'Huge company vision and rapid growth opportunities, and teams made of smart, ambitious, and fun colleagues', 'The statements herein are intended to describe the general nature and level of work being performed by employees, and are not to be construed as an exhaustive list of responsibilities, duties, and skills required of personnel so classified. Furthermore, they do not establish a contract for employment and are subject to change at the discretion of the employer.', 'We’re looking for people with a background and interest in building successful products or systems, comfortable in dealing with lots of moving pieces, have amazing attention to detail, and you’re comfortable learning new technologies and systems.', 'Develop solutions using appropriate languages, tools, databases, and technologies.\xa0You care about the overall solution.', 'As an Engineer, you will be responsible for the entire life cycle of an application to include analysis, coding, testing, and documentation. job_title: Sr. Data Engineer (AWS, Python, Airflow & R), Data Science Products (open to remote)
job_text: ['', ' Demonstrated ability to collaborate with all levels of data science engineering technology personnel and senior leadership. ', 'Your Competencies', ' Collaborate with data engineers, data scientists, software engineers, business leaders and cross-functional stakeholders to implement data science engineering solutions based on business priorities and technology initiatives. ', ' Hands-on experience in the latest breed of software, automation and CICD technologies including Python, SQL, Airflow and Git in a cloud setting. Experience with R is preferred. ', ' 3+ years professional experience as a cloud data engineer, data scientist or related role. ', ' Solve complex business questions where situations or data require in-depth evaluation of variable factors. ', ' Power smarter treatments and healthier people with innovative data analytic applications.  Develop advanced cloud (AWS) based data systems to extract, assess, integrate, transform, clean, analyze and visualize datasets for complex analytics and statistical modeling.  Create automated data flows for research and production settings with data science engineering best practices, transparency, and scalability.  Solve complex business questions where situations or data require in-depth evaluation of variable factors.  Assess analytical data sources, conduct hands-on exploration to determine their value, and make them available enterprise-wide.  Collaborate with data engineers, data scientists, software engineers, business leaders and cross-functional stakeholders to implement data science engineering solutions based on business priorities and technology initiatives. ', ' Undergraduate degree in a technical or engineering field, such as Data Engineering, Data Science, Data Analytics, Computer Science or Software Engineering. Masters degree is a plus. ', ' Create automated data flows for research and production settings with data science engineering best practices, transparency, and scalability. ', ' Entrepreneurial spirit and commitment to creating rigorous, high-quality insights from data, at scale. ', ' Advanced skills in modern data architecture, data science engineering, data transformation, data modeling and manipulation of structured and unstructured data sources using state-of-art cloud computing technologies (AWS). ', ' Clear, concise communication abilities – writing, verbal, presentation – to all levels of technical and non-technical audiences. ', ' Familiarity with Big Data processing and distributed database technologies including Spark and NoSQL. ', ' Power smarter treatments and healthier people with innovative data analytic applications. ', 'Your Mission', ' Undergraduate degree in a technical or engineering field, such as Data Engineering, Data Science, Data Analytics, Computer Science or Software Engineering. Masters degree is a plus.  3+ years professional experience as a cloud data engineer, data scientist or related role.  Experience with clinical trial data is not required, but interest to learn and understand how these data drive medical research is paramount. ', 'Medidata Solutions, Inc. is an Equal Opportunity Employer. Medidata Solutions provides equal employment opportunities to all employees and applicants for employment without regard to race, color, religion, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, age, disability status, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by the law. Medidata Solutions complies with applicable state and local laws governing non-discrimination in employment in every location in which the company has facilities.', ' Assess analytical data sources, conduct hands-on exploration to determine their value, and make them available enterprise-wide. ', ' Experience with clinical trial data is not required, but interest to learn and understand how these data drive medical research is paramount. ', ' Advanced skills in modern data architecture, data science engineering, data transformation, data modeling and manipulation of structured and unstructured data sources using state-of-art cloud computing technologies (AWS).  Hands-on experience in the latest breed of software, automation and CICD technologies including Python, SQL, Airflow and Git in a cloud setting. Experience with R is preferred.  Familiarity with Big Data processing and distributed database technologies including Spark and NoSQL.  Demonstrated ability to collaborate with all levels of data science engineering technology personnel and senior leadership.  Clear, concise communication abilities – writing, verbal, presentation – to all levels of technical and non-technical audiences.  Entrepreneurial spirit and commitment to creating rigorous, high-quality insights from data, at scale. ', ' Develop advanced cloud (AWS) based data systems to extract, assess, integrate, transform, clean, analyze and visualize datasets for complex analytics and statistical modeling. ', 'Your Education & Experience']

job_text: ['', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Tech lead for data and digital pipeline development', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0In depth technical expertise either data analysis and design, data modeling, data warehousing, business intelligence and data quality improvement', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Prior experience in financial services, risk management preferred', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0a follow-up call to further discuss the position, your interests and expertise.', 'Please refer to Job #23546 and send attached resume to tim@analyticrecruiting.com │', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Analyze data contained in data warehouses, data lakes and proprietary source systems', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Strong aptitude for enhancing and automating queries (e.g. T-SQL) from various data sources such as RDB’s (Oracle and SQL Server) data warehouses, data lakes or flat files', 'Responsibilities include:', 'Well established growing financial services firm seeks a Data Systems Analyst with experience developing “Data” related systems utilized in business intelligence, data warehousing, master data management or metadata management.', 'Keywords', 'Keywords: SQL, Database development, ETL, Data Engineer, Data Analysis, Analytics', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Designing, building and implementing ETL solutions, dashboards and reports.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Work with Data Scientists in adapting data models into production systems', 'For more opportunities, please visit us at www.analyticrecruiting.com\xa0', 'Data Systems Analyst', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0BS/BA degree in a related technical discipline', 'Title: Data Systems Analyst- Las Vegas, Nevada', 'Title: Data Systems Analyst', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Developing and review complex ETLs, SQL, T-SQL scripts, stored procedures and SSIS workflows', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Minimum of two years in Data Engineering/Development', 'Position requirements:', 'If you are a suitable candidate, you can expect:', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Hands on experience with one or more of the following: MS BI Stack (SSIS, SSAS, SSRS), SQL, Python, SQL Server, Big Data Frameworks, Oracle or SharePoint', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Work with various business units to gather business requirements and transform them into technical solutions', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience working with and developing complex reports using Excel, Pivot Tables, VBA and Macros', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Your resume will be sent to our client(s) only after we obtain your approval.']

['', 'Write automated tests to ensure code is of the highest quality.', 'Collaborate with designers to ensure we deliver the optimal user experience.', 'Work closely with software engineers to guide their technical and career growth.', 'Works effectively in fast-paced, agile startup environment, and finds fulfillment delivering innovative solutions.', 'Translate user stories into software solutions (50%)', 'This posting is not designed to cover or contain a comprehensive listing of activities, duties or responsibilities that are required of the employee and any percentages listed are approximate. Duties, responsibilities and activities may change or new ones may be assigned at any time with or without notice.', 'Wellframe, Inc. is an equal opportunity employer. Qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability or protected veteran status or any other characteristic protected by local, state, or federal laws, rules, or regulations.', 'Senior Software Engineer is responsible for building the software that enables our digital care management platform, while mentoring junior engineers on the team. They accomplish this by working closely with other engineers, product managers, designers and data scientists. The Senior Software Engineer sits within the Engineering department and reports to a Manager of Software Engineering. Success in this role is demonstrated by translating business requirements that have an impact on patient care into high quality solutions coded with security and privacy best practices in mind.\xa0', 'Work with product managers and scrum masters to develop proof of concepts and estimates for future work.\xa0', 'Participate in on-call rotations to make sure our systems have exemplar uptime and reliability.', 'At Wellframe, we reimagine healthcare relationships through a new approach that uses high-tech to deliver the high-touch support people need, when and where they need it. We call it Digital Health Management. Our comprehensive suite of Digital Health Management solutions for care management, advocacy, and navigation help organizations forge more meaningful connections with members, across their healthcare journey.\xa0', 'Work with our customer support team to debug and fix bugs affecting our users.', 'At least 3 years development experience building SaaS or cloud-based commercial software products.', 'Values the difference between good code and correct code, and cares about test-driven development without dogma.', 'Work closely with product managers and scrum masters to understand the business problems.', 'Lead initiatives (10%)', 'Lead the technical delivery of the initiative from design to deployment.', 'Debug and fix production issues (20%)', 'Scope out complexity of future work (10%)', 'Work with product managers and scrum masters to lead the definition and decomposition of big initiatives.', 'A B.S. or M.S. degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, or a closely related field of study.', 'Mentor Software Engineers (10%)', 'Excellent communicator, comfortable explaining technical problems and plans in person and in writing.', 'Work with product managers and scrum masters to lead the definition and decomposition of big initiatives.Lead the technical delivery of the initiative from design to deployment.', 'Areas of Responsibility:', 'A B.S. or M.S. degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, or a closely related field of study.At least 3 years development experience building SaaS or cloud-based commercial software products.Experienced with backend frameworks such as Spring or Ruby on Rails .Proficient with a modern scripting language such as Python.Makes good trade-offs for core design and API decisions — knows when to stick to convention, but also when to break it.Excellent communicator, comfortable explaining technical problems and plans in person and in writing.Values the difference between good code and correct code, and cares about test-driven development without dogma.Demonstrable history of technical mentorship.\xa0Experience leading complex initiatives from technical design to delivery.\xa0Thrives on diverse technical challenges — our system integrates a wide variety of healthcare and other technologies.Passionate about leveraging their technical skills to help improve patient care.Works effectively in fast-paced, agile startup environment, and finds fulfillment delivering innovative solutions.', 'Validate design approach with other senior engineers.', 'Education, Experience, & Skills Required:', 'Work closely with product managers and scrum masters to understand the business problems.Collaborate with designers to ensure we deliver the optimal user experience.Validate design approach with other senior engineers.Write automated tests to ensure code is of the highest quality.', 'Passionate about leveraging their technical skills to help improve patient care.', 'Experienced with backend frameworks such as Spring or Ruby on Rails .Proficient with a modern scripting language such as Python.', 'Demonstrable history of technical mentorship.\xa0Experience leading complex initiatives from technical design to delivery.\xa0Thrives on diverse technical challenges — our system integrates a wide variety of healthcare and other technologies.', 'The Care management team uses technology to improve care manager adoption and deploy complex care teams. The team is seeking a passionate and a curious engineer who has the ability to collaborate across teams, and can display humility and tenacity in their day to day tasks. The candidate will get an opportunity to work in healthcare technology and see how we improve care management.', 'Participate in on-call rotations to make sure our systems have exemplar uptime and reliability.Work with our customer support team to debug and fix bugs affecting our users.', 'Wellframe was founded to counter a pressing industry problem: the healthcare system has struggled to find ways to support people in between care settings, at scale. We believe health plans are in the best position to advocate for their members as they navigate their health and care, but know that technology alone can’t help us achieve this ambition. That’s why our team of physicians, clinicians, public health experts, data scientists, engineers, and healthcare industry experts ensure our patented technology works in service of the person-to-person connections that make healthcare work best.', 'Makes good trade-offs for core design and API decisions — knows when to stick to convention, but also when to break it.']

job_title: Big Data Software Engineer w/Secret Clearance
job_text: ['', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Creating technical roadmaps', 'As a Senior Software Engineer, this work involves developing an overall data management strategy and a fully realized data architecture. This challenging and interesting position is a chance to participate in the development and operation of a state-of-the-art custom-built Big Data system and join a long-lived, stable program consisting of a team of exceptional high-quality individuals using defined Agile software principles and practices. Propose strategies to enhance existing data warehousing capabilities that improve the ability to spot trends in data and support the strategic planning and technology innovation.\xa0Work with the team to maintain the current architecture and develop roadmaps to identify and define future strategies. Address gaps in business processes and technology stacks that negatively impact business operations and/or customer experience. Evaluate emerging technologies and apply best of breed technologies to the mission solutions delivery, in a manner consistent with the highest levels of industry best practices and quality assurance. Recommend and design the patterns and standards that will be followed to implement end-to-end integrated applications, while engaging in initiatives to improve operational effectiveness. Evaluate and implement changes and/or enhancements to existing legacy systems/platforms/applications to determine the feasibility, benefits, costs, and risks.', 'Active Secret Clearance Required ', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Ideally, you will also have experience with:', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Creative problem solving and critical thinking', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Understanding of Data mining techniques', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Evaluating emerging technologies', 'Location: Oakton, VA\xa0', 'https://www.linkedin.com/in/aprilbright/', 'Big Data Software Engineer w/Secret Clearance', 'Required Education', 'For this and other positions contact:', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience with Data Management tools', 'Duration: FULL TIME - PERM ', 'Very Competitive Compensation\xa0\xa0\xa0', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0User interface development', 'Bachelor"s degree in Software Engineering or related degree, plus a minimum of 8 years of relevant experience; or Master\'s degree plus a\xa0minimum of 6 years of relevant experience. Agile experience preferred.', 'NOTE:\xa0AGAIN - MUST BE US CITIZEN to be eligible for this position. There is no relocation or expense package offered for this position. Rates are all inclusive W2 hourly wages. No 1099, No third parties, no C2C', 'Required Skills: ', 'Required Education:', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Understanding of Database architectures', 'abright@geologics.com', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0DevSecOps and continuous integration and deployment tools and techniques', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Familiar with or direct experience with Extract Transform, and Load (ETL)', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience developing software in Linux environment', 'Senior Recruiter', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Cloud storage/cloud solutions', 'April Bright', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Very Large Databases (VLDB)/Big Data/Data Warehouses', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Aptitude to quickly grasp and apply new information', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Business processes and technology stacks', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience supporting 24/7 mission critical systems', 'AGAIN - MUST BE US CITIZEN', 'NOTE:', '\ufeff***US Citizenship REQUIRED*** It does not help to apply without citizenship. We cannot accept any other form of work authorization (H1, EAD etc) or do corp to corp. ', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience integrating tools and applications into a larger system', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Ability to work effectively within a team', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0High performance parallel computing']

job_title: Senior Data Integration Engineer and Developer

Experience working on a small team with direct input from the end users  Demonstrated ability to manage disparate data from various source to deliver a user focused and scalable solutions  Ability to manage multiple small projects and deliver results as part of a self organizing team  An understanding of and preference for working in an agile framework using SAFe principles.  Strong proficiency in Microsoft Office suite  Excellent written and verbal communication skills ', ' 3 years as a systems analyst or equivalent experience ', ' Experience working on a small team with direct input from the end users ', ' Experience with REDCap system administration and project development ', ' Excellent written and verbal communication skills ', ' Demonstrated data analysis and visualizations in Tableau ', ' Other duties as requested by Office of Research at Inova staff/management. ', ' Experience in more than two of the following: Relational Databases (SQL), Python, ETL pipelines, data profiling and reporting using enterprise grade tools. ', 'Work Site Location', ' Build and deploy software architecture to support program initiatives and improve access to data and it’s fidelity. ', 'Shift', ' Ability to manage multiple small projects and deliver results as part of a self organizing team ', ' Identify and propose solutions for improving redundancies in skills and procedures that insure smooth business performance and good data stewardship. ', ' Serve as the primary system administrator for the Research Electronic Data Capture (REDCap) platform.  Assist with the development of the structure and datasets for a large-scale data warehouse supporting Inova’s growing research efforts.  Serve as the internal business intelligence reporting subject matter expert in requirements gathering, rapid prototyping and development of proofs of concept and production dashboards.  Build and deploy software architecture to support program initiatives and improve access to data and it’s fidelity.  Lead ad hoc data cleansing, data analysis and research to answer internal and external inquiries.  Develop to and maintain technical documentation for each solution. Including data dictionary, data flow diagrams, etc.  Gather requirements and propose, research, and develop advanced analytics solutions that will expand the technical capabilities and data of Inova assets. Other duties as requested by Office of Research at Inova staff/management. ', ' 5+ years as a Systems Analyst or equivalent experience ', ' Experience working on cloud infrastructure i.e. AWS ']

['', 'Experience using reporting tools such as Power BI and Qlik', '\xa0', 'Understanding of cloud technologies such as AWS', 'Awareness of Apache Hadoop, HDFS, Hive', 'Qualifications', 'Job Description', '\xa02 - 5+ years of experience working in technologyApache airflow experience is\xa0a mustExperience with database management systems, schema design, query optimizationPython for building and redefining data pipelines is requiredExperience Designing Tables and Writing Queries within a SQL EnvironmentBS degree in Computer Science, Information Systems or equivalent experienceExcellent debugging, problem solving and testing skillsExperience in data warehouse concepts, ETL tools such as Informatica, Pentaho, Apache AirflowExperience using reporting tools such as Power BI and QlikGood interpersonal/management skills and capable of working individually and as part of a teamUnderstanding of cloud technologies such as AWSAwareness of Apache Hadoop, HDFS, Hive', 'Excellent debugging, problem solving and testing skills', 'Experience in data warehouse concepts, ETL tools such as Informatica, Pentaho, Apache Airflow', 'We believe that a diverse environment improves us as a community and as a business. We want to foster an environment of growth, where all ideas and contributions are encouraged. We need this culture of courage to continue to thrive in our fast-paced industry. We embrace differences of opinion. We value diversity of experience and thought, which help us to challenge and define industry-leading solutions, and support our goal of being a great place to work.', 'Perform data loads and optimize data for extraction and reporting useDesign and implement ETL jobs and transformations to populate a data warehouseMaintain complex databases by performing appropriate database management functions (e.g., maintain space availability, rebuilds indexes, file cleanup, runs utilities to check database integrity) to ensure optimum capacity and application performanceMonitor, report, and analyze usage trends and statistical output in order to maintain quality control and high performance of the data retrieval from a database or other data storage', '\ufeff', 'We foster a diverse environment that encourages original thinking about our business and empowers us to communicate with a global world of customers.\xa0We embrace differences of opinion and diversity of thought as they help us challenge and refine our solutions. Merkle, as a best-in-class marketing agency, welcomes big ideas, and believes they can come from anywhere.\xa0\xa0', 'Design and implement ETL jobs and transformations to populate a data warehouse', 'Experience Designing Tables and Writing Queries within a SQL Environment', 'Experience with database management systems, schema design, query optimization', 'Good interpersonal/management skills and capable of working individually and as part of a team', 'Responsibilities:', '\xa02 - 5+ years of experience working in technology', 'Maintain complex databases by performing appropriate database management functions (e.g., maintain space availability, rebuilds indexes, file cleanup, runs utilities to check database integrity) to ensure optimum capacity and application performance', 'Monitor, report, and analyze usage trends and statistical output in order to maintain quality control and high performance of the data retrieval from a database or other data storage', 'Perform data loads and optimize data for extraction and reporting use', 'Python for building and redefining data pipelines is required', ' ', 'The Data Engineer is responsible for designing, implementing, deploying, and supporting various data management technologies and architectures.\xa0In partnership with business leaders, key stakeholders and cross-functional project teams, the Data Engineer will be an active contributor in a collaborative team structure and will have the opportunity to accelerate the delivery of and improve the quality of HelloWorld products providing increased operational excellence, a greater client experience and other strategic objectives.\xa0', 'Apache airflow experience is\xa0a must', 'Must be authorized to work in the US without sponsorship now or in the future', 'Many locations and remote US work considered.', 'BS degree in Computer Science, Information Systems or equivalent experience', "Merkle is a leading data-driven, technology-enabled, global performance marketing agency that specializes in the delivery of unique, personalized customer experiences across platforms and devices.\xa0For more than 30 years, Fortune 1000 companies and leading nonprofit organizations have partnered with Merkle to maximize the value of their customer portfolios. The agency's heritage in data, technology, and analytics forms the foundation for its unmatched skills in understanding consumer insights that drive people-based marketing strategies. Its combined strengths in performance media, customer experience, customer relationship management, loyalty, and enterprise marketing technology drive improved marketing results and competitive advantage. With 9,600 employees, Merkle is headquartered in Columbia, Maryland, with 24 additional offices in the US and 29\xa0offices in Europe and APAC. In 2016, the agency joined the Dentsu Aegis Network."]

For over 15 years, we have been in the business of using innovative technology to improve the efficiency and accuracy of healthcare delivery. Today, we are changing the way patients are cared for, by providing unparalleled data and insights in real-time to doctors and patients when they need it most.', 'Solve complex data issues and perform root cause analysis', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Hands on coder who understands the concepts behind distributed databases, batch and stream processing', 'Strong experience using managed services and Infrastructure as a service. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, or protected veteran status and will not be discriminated against on the basis of disability.', 'Extensive knowledge of existing industry standards, technologies, and operational norms;', 'Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Management Information Systems or related field; or equivalent experience;', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Strong programming experience in Python and Java/Scala preferred', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Strong familiarity with healthcare data formats including EDI and FHIR', '10+ years of IT experience with at least 2 years’ experience with public cloud (AWS) including serverless architecture and cloud warehousing solutions.', 'Fulfill those responsibilities and/or duties that may be reasonably provided by Inovalon for the purpose of achieving operational and financial success of the Company.', 'Work across teams to resolve operational & performance issues', 'Experience building CI/CD pipelines in public cloud and creating a culture of automation.', 'Research, evaluate and utilize new technologies/tools/frameworks centered around high-volume data processing in AWS.']

job_title: Lead Software Engineer (Remote or in Office)
job_text: ['', '5 to 7 years of experience in designing, developing, and maintaining highly available, supportable solutions. ', 'Excellent English communication skills, speaking and writing.', 'Work closely with the business and the product owner to build and deliver. ', '3 to 5 years of proven and relevant technical leadership in mobile and SaaS environments. ', 'Provide technical leadership while writing code majority of the time. ', 'Solid understanding of Java and Kotlin.', 'Experience in Android development using Android SDK and ADT is a big plus.', 'Disclaimer: This job description is only a summary of the typical functions of the job, not an exhaustive or comprehensive list of all possible job responsibilities, tasks, and duties. In addition to a great work environment, we offer snacks and drinks provided in the office, ergonomic desk and chairs, massage chair in the break room, plenty of window views as well as daily walks outside (when the Minnesota weather allows). Define, design and ship new features on an agile team, delivering the latest and greatest applications to our consumers all across the globe. Lead, inspire, and deliver on time and on budget.  ', 'Overview', 'PTO, Health – Dental – Vision Insurance, Tuition Reimbursements, and Life insurance', ' 5 to 7 years of experience in designing, developing, and maintaining highly available, supportable solutions.  Experienced in designing, developing, and managing services deployed to AWS. 3 to 5 years of proven and relevant technical leadership in mobile and SaaS environments.  Demonstrated experience and an understanding of OOP, Design Patterns and memory management. Experience building multi-threaded applications on Android, iOS, and/or back end platforms. Experience in Android development using Android SDK and ADT is a big plus. Solid understanding of Java and Kotlin. Familiarity with the Google Ad Manager (DFP) is preferable.  AWS development experience is a big plus.  Excellent English communication skills, speaking and writing. ['', 'REQUIRED QUALIIFICATIONS:', 'Contribute to all phases of the development life cycle, from analysis to design, implementation, QA, and documentation.', 'We are looking for a Software Engineer Intern to join our growing internship program in the Alpharetta, GA, Stonebranch Global Headquarters. As a Software Engineer Intern, you will contribute your knowledge and ideas in building/refactoring the existing code base to improve our Universal Automation Center software architecture and robustness. Additionally, you will help implement features to position our leading automation software in line with our product roadmap and vision.', '*Please note that we are prioritizing those applicants local to the Atlanta Metropolitan Area.\xa0', 'Contribute to all phases of the development life cycle, from analysis to design, implementation, QA, and documentation.Provide estimations, implement, test, and deliver features and bug fixes based on the release plan.Configuration and maintenance of software and scripts which support development activities. Includes build, unit level testing, automated testing and deployment of code.Embrace development best practices, such as TDD (Test-Driven Development) and test automation', "Stonebranch builds dynamic IT automation solutions that transform business IT environments from simple IT task automation into sophisticated, real-time business service automation, helping organizations achieve the highest possible Return on Automation. No matter the degree of automation, Stonebranch software is simple, modern and secure. Using its universal automation platform, enterprises can seamlessly orchestrate workloads and data across technology ecosystems and silos. Headquartered in Atlanta, Georgia with points of contact and support throughout the Americas, Europe, and Asia, Stonebranch serves some of the world's largest financial, manufacturing, healthcare, travel, transportation, energy, and technology institutions.", 'Apply Online Today', 'Must be legally permitted to work in the United States', 'We are an Equal Opportunity Employer and do not discriminate against applicants due to race, ethnicity, gender, veteran status, or on the basis of disability or any other federal, state or local protected class.', 'Responsibilities include but are not limited to:', 'Written and verbal communication skills', 'Computer EngineeringComputer ScienceInformation SystemsCreative problem solving and critical thinking skillsWritten and verbal communication skillsThe desire to learn from Senior Engineers and work well in a collaborative team environmentMust be 18 years of age or olderMust be legally permitted to work in the United StatesExperience in a relevant programming language, preferably Java or C++', 'Must be 18 years of age or older', 'You will work under the guidance of a more senior engineer or team lead. This is a temporary role with potential to grow into a permanent position', 'Full-time student pursuing an undergraduate degree in one of the following fields or related studies:', 'POSITION RESPONSIBILITIES:', 'Creative problem solving and critical thinking skills', 'The desire to learn from Senior Engineers and work well in a collaborative team environment', 'Embrace development best practices, such as TDD (Test-Driven Development) and test automation', 'Information Systems', 'Provide estimations, implement, test, and deliver features and bug fixes based on the release plan.', 'MISSION', 'Configuration and maintenance of software and scripts which support development activities. Includes build, unit level testing, automated testing and deployment of code.', 'Experience in a relevant programming language, preferably Java or C++', 'Computer Engineering', 'Computer Science']

['', ' Ability to communicate technical hurdles and challenges clearly and succinctly ', ' 3+ years of development experience building large scale data solutions using Google Cloud Platform, BigQuery, Google DatafFlow, Apache Spark, Airflow, Kafka, Scala, and Python  Experience with AWS RedShift, Kinesis, and Data Pipeline will also be considered  Proven ability to work closely with business and product teams to ensure data solutions are aligned with business initiatives and are of high quality  Ability to communicate technical hurdles and challenges clearly and succinctly  Take problems from inception to completion - own the building, testing, deployment, and maintenance of the code that you work on  Experience with reporting schema designs including data modeling, denormalization, data warehousing, and data lakes ', '  OPPORTUNITIES FOR ADVANCEMENT - We are a growing company that offers career opportunities, and not just “another job”. Applied believes in growing our employees and promoting from within, offering many opportunities for professional advancement along the way! ', ' RELAXED DRESS CODE ', ' EMPLOYEES ', ' CLIENTS ', ' Please visit AppliedSystems.com ', ' Drive innovation within Data Engineering by playing a key role in technology decisions for the future of our data science, analysis, and reporting needs ', ' JOIN A GREAT TEAM ', 'Company Culture & Perks', '  BENEFITS FROM DAY ONE  - Applied offers Medical, Rx, Dental, Vision, Virtual Doctors’ Appointments, Health Savings Account, Flexible Spending Accounts, Critical Illness, Group Accident, and Wellness Incentives to ensure employees are covered from day one.   FINANCIAL PEACE OF MIND  - In addition to wellness benefits, Applied offers traditional and Roth 401k options, with employer match. Accidental Death & Dismemberment, Short and Long Term Disability, and Business Travel Accident insurance are also offered.   WORKLIFE BALANCE  - There is more to life than work: that is why Applied offers benefits to help balance your work and home life. We offer competitive paid vacation time, personal/sick time, paid holidays, summer hours, paid parental leave, volunteer time off, and a free day off for your birthday! ', ' Take problems from inception to completion - own the building, testing, deployment, and maintenance of the code that you work on ', ' 2020 Company of the Year (Stevie Award)  2020 New Product or Service of the Year- 2 awards (Stevie Award)  2019 Best Cloud-Based Software Solutions Provider in the insurance industry (2019 Corporate Excellence Awards)  2019 Digital Service Provider of the Year (Business Excellence Awards)  2019 Best Broker Software Management House (Insurance Times) ', '  LEADING GLOBAL PROVIDER OF CLOUD-BASED INSURANCE SOFTWARE - Applied Systems develops the top two Insurance Agency/Broker Management software products in the world. ['', 'Automate and handle the life-cycle of the systems and platforms that process our data.', 'Evolve maturity of our monitoring systems and processes to improve visibility and failures detection in our infrastructure.', 'You have experience provisioning and maintaining large big data clusters. You have worked on scalability and reliability challenges for the same.', 'You have a strong dedication to code quality, automation and operational excellence: unit/integration tests, scripts, workflows.', " 7+ years of relevant technical experience, including significant experience with site reliability, developer productivity or DevOps, or server infrastructure engineering.  You have experience working with data technologies that power analytics (e.g. Apache Sqoop, Airflow, Hadoop, Hive, Spark, Presto, Kafka, Pinot, Flink, etc. or similar technologies). You have experience provisioning and maintaining large big data clusters. You have worked on scalability and reliability challenges for the same. In-depth knowledge on a few of the production technologies we use including AWS (CloudFormation, EC2), Docker, Terraform, Kubernetes, Chef You can lead technical architecture discussions and help drive technical decisions within your team. You have a strong dedication to code quality, automation and operational excellence: unit/integration tests, scripts, workflows. You are a strong communicator. Explaining complex technical concepts to designers, support, and other engineers is no problem for you. You have a Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering or a related field, or equivalent training, fellowship, or work experience. ", ' You’ll own technical strategy for broad or complex requirements with insightful and forward-looking approaches that go beyond the direct team and solve large open-ended problems. ['5+ years of relevant professional experience', 'SQL and MapReduce job tuning to improve data processing performance', "Our client's community is what they are and it's what they do. It's what makes them different. To create the best ride for all, they start in their own community by creating an open, inclusive, and diverse organization where all team members are recognized for what they bring.", 'Evolve data model and data schema based on business and engineering needs', 'www.newjourneyai.com', 'Owner of the core company data pipeline, responsible for scaling up data processing flow to meet the rapid data growthEvolve data model and data schema based on business and engineering needsImplement systems tracking data quality and consistencyDevelop tools supporting self-service data pipeline management (ETL)SQL and MapReduce job tuning to improve data processing performance', "Comfortable working directly with data analytics to bridge our client's business goals with data engineering", 'Good understanding of SQL Engine and able to conduct advanced performance tuning', "Our client's community is what they are and it's what they do. It's what makes them different. To create the best ride for all, they start in their own community by creating an open, inclusive, and diverse organization where all team members are recognized for what they bring.Data is the only way our client makes decisions. It is the core of their business, helping them create a transportation experience for their customers and providing insights into the effectiveness of their product launch & features.As a Data Engineer, you will be a part of an early stage team that builds the data transport, collection, and storage, and exposes services that make data a first-class citizen. Our client is looking for a Data Engineer to build a scalable data platform. You'll have ownership of their core data pipeline that powers top line metrics; You will also use data expertise to help evolve data models in several components of the data stack; You will help architect, building, and launching scalable data pipelines to support growing data processing and analytics needs. Your efforts will allow access to business and user behavior insights, using huge amounts of data to fuel several teams such as Analytics, Data Science, Marketplace and many others.You will report to a Data Engineering Manager.", 'About New Journey AI:', '1+ years of experience with workflow management tools (Airflow, Oozie, Azkaban, UC4)', 'Owner of the core company data pipeline, responsible for scaling up data processing flow to meet the rapid data growth', 'If you have the described qualifications and are interested in this exciting opportunity, please apply!', 'Requirements:', 'Strong skills in scripting language (Python, Ruby, Bash)', 'Description:', 'Responsibilities:', 'You will report to a Data Engineering Manager.', 'Develop tools supporting self-service data pipeline management (ETL)', 'Proficient in at least one of the SQL languages (MySQL, PostgreSQL, SqlServer, Oracle)', "As a Data Engineer, you will be a part of an early stage team that builds the data transport, collection, and storage, and exposes services that make data a first-class citizen. Our client is looking for a Data Engineer to build a scalable data platform. You'll have ownership of their core data pipeline that powers top line metrics; You will also use data expertise to help evolve data models in several components of the data stack; You will help architect, building, and launching scalable data pipelines to support growing data processing and analytics needs. Your efforts will allow access to business and user behavior insights, using huge amounts of data to fuel several teams such as Analytics, Data Science, Marketplace and many others.", 'To learn more about New Journey AI and to view all our available career opportunities, please visit us at ', 'Implement systems tracking data quality and consistency', 'New Journey AI is currently seeking a Data Engineer with our client in their San Francisco, CA location. This is a 12+ month/year contract position.', 'Experience with Hadoop (or similar) Ecosystem (MapReduce, Yarn, HDFS, Hive, Spark, Presto, Pig, HBase, Parquet)', 'Data is the only way our client makes decisions. It is the core of their business, helping them create a transportation experience for their customers and providing insights into the effectiveness of their product launch & features.', 'We are passionate about technologyand understanding how technology can help create a better tomorrow, today. We can contribute to perfecting the intelligence behind the self-driving vehicle by providing drivers to test, track and capture their experiences. Sounds simple, but the experiences and learnings lead to data which helps advance smart livingimproving safety and protecting lives, advancing mobility and contributing to a greener planet.New Journey AI will create employment opportunities and pave a new career path, but moreover, at the heart, we are a people company that is helping our clients advance new, experimental, driverless AI technology to improve the transportation of people, safely. Our role is to support the testing of the driverless technology and gathering data to refine machine learning.As the partner of choice to the self-driving industry, we actively promote and encourage diversity and inclusion of all people regardless of race, ethnicity or socio-economic status.', "5+ years of relevant professional experienceExperience with Hadoop (or similar) Ecosystem (MapReduce, Yarn, HDFS, Hive, Spark, Presto, Pig, HBase, Parquet)Proficient in at least one of the SQL languages (MySQL, PostgreSQL, SqlServer, Oracle)Good understanding of SQL Engine and able to conduct advanced performance tuningStrong skills in scripting language (Python, Ruby, Bash)1+ years of experience with workflow management tools (Airflow, Oozie, Azkaban, UC4)Comfortable working directly with data analytics to bridge our client's business goals with data engineering", '.  "New Journey AI is an Equal Opportunity Employer, M/F/D/V']
